Description: Rim sherd of Chian pottery Type B kantharos; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky brown below; top of rim glazed; exterior reserved; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The number 45 is written in pencil on the interior surface of the sherd. Many kantharoi Type B have painted inscriptions beneath the rim and as well as from Naukratis they have been found on Aegina (Williams 1983, 169). Williams, D. ‘Aigina, Aphaia-Tempel 5. The pottery from Chios’, Archäologischer Anzeiger 1983.
Bibliographic references: Cook & Woodhead 1952 / Painted Inscriptions on Chiot Pottery (p. 170, no. 206)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 732, no. 926)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1691) (phase 2)
